explains: vt. 带领；作……的船长（或机长）

sentences.en: The skipper notified the coastguard of the tragedy.
sentences.cn: 船长通知了海岸警卫队这一灾难。

sentences.en: The skipper was not willing to risk taking his ship through the straits until he could see where he was going.
sentences.cn: 这位船长不愿意冒险在看不见方向之前将船开过海峡。

sentences.en: The skipper pushed the boat hard, creating a broad white backwash at our stern.
sentences.cn: 船长加快船速，使得船尾产生一片宽大的白色逆流。
